===============
Getting Started
===============

Installation
------------

.. _PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/laspy/
.. _conda-forge: https://conda-forge.org/

To install `LSAPy` from `PyPI`_ using `pip`:

.. code-block:: shell

   pip install lsapy

or from `conda-forge`_ using `conda`:

.. code-block:: shell

   conda install -c conda-forge lsapy
